base-text.text:
<-- removed all between anchor and app; anchor not used, could be removed -->
Government of new Territory of Nevada—Governor Nye and the practical jokers—Mr. Clemens begins journalistic life on Virginia City Enterprise—Reports legislative sessions—He and Orion prosper—Orion builds $12,000. house—Gov. Nye turns Territory of Nevada into a State. (Miss Hobby, please paste this in at this point, in record of April 1st, but I may not comment on it until later.)

authoritative-text.text:
<-- removed all between anchor and app; anchor not used, could be removed -->
Government of new Territory of Nevada—Governor Nye and the practical jokers—Mr. Clemens begins journalistic life on Virginia City Enterprise—Reports legislative sessions—He and Orion prosper—Orion builds twelve-thousand-dollar house—Governor Nye turns Territory of Nevada into a State.
